title: Best of the Program | Guests: Rep. Chip Roy & Leslie McAdoo Gordon | 3/9/22
description:
Pat Gray joins Glenn to discuss the Ukrainian government and President Biden’s latest lies. Rep. Chip Roy joins Glenn to discuss Biden’s upcoming spending bill and all the junk it contains. Glenn discusses a loss of trust in our criminal justice system.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
